indicated yo pull up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice repeat from * twice more in same st/space 4 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 4tr-cluster 4 treble cluster * yo twice insert hook in st/space indicated yo pull up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice repeat from * 3 more in same st/space 5 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 2dtr-cluster 2 double treble_crochet cluster *yo 3 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 3 times repeat from * once more in same st/space 3 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 3dtr-cluster 3 double treble_crochet cluster *yo 3 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 3 times repeat from * twice more in same st/space 4 loops on hook yo draw through all loops 4trtr-cluster 4 treble treble_crochet cluster *yo 4 times insert hook in st/space yo pull up lp yo draw through 2 loops 4 times repeat from * 3 more times in same st/space 5 loops on hook yo draw through all loops puff puff yo insert hook in st/space yo pull up loop 3 times in same st/space 7 loops on hook yo draw through all loops pattern notes double magic_ring i prefer to start all my snowflakes with a double magic_ring this is executed just like a normal magic_ring with the exception of wrapping the yarn twice at the beginning instead of once if you prefer you may use a standard magic_ring i do not recommend replacing the magic_ring with chains as the snowflakes have been designed to have a very tightly closed center and the chains will leave a visible hole stiffening snowflakes these snowflakes have been designed to be firmly stiffened and most will not hang properly without stiffening i have provided instructions at the end of these patterns for how i prefer to stiffen items 3 | page copyright © 2022 by jessica wifall all rights reserved instructions frozen freeze approximately 3 5inches make a double magic_ring round 1 ch1 does not count as st in magic_ring 1sc ch1 counts as double_crochet * ch1 2dc repeat from * 4 more times ch1 1dc slip_stitch 1-chain of starting double_crochet pull magic_ring tight 12 double_crochet 6 1-chain round 2 1sc in next 1-chain space ch3 counts as first treble_crochet 3tr in same space * ch3 4tr in next 1-chain space repeat from * 4 more times ch3 slip_stitch in third chain of first treble_crochet 24 treble_crochet 6 2-chain round 3 ch4 counts as first treble_crochet 1tr * ch4 2tr ch2 1sc in chain-space ch2 2tr repeat from * 5 more times omitting last 2tr slip_stitch in 4th chain of first treble_crochet 24
